THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.How the thumbnail visually reinforces th: The thumbnail directly shows ovulation tests, demonstrates possible errors and correct readings with clear visual cues (X and check), and highlights that viewers may be misunderstanding something—matching the title's question 'ARE YOU READING THEM RIGHT?' and reinforcing the sense of needing to learn something new.
